summary:
Derek is my very personal "Original Character".
Derek lost his wife, many years ago because she was pretty sick, he only has his Son Logan left.
Check the long Description to learn more about him. :)

All my Followers have an Schlongs of Skyrim support.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Courier New][size=2]This time I've created one of my very personal "Original Characters", be nice to him.
Don't sacrifice him to an crazy Cult, thank you.[/size]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/4AgN1H9.png[/img]
I won't tell much about him, [url=http://punkmiketaylor.deviantart.com/art/Derek-Bio-sheet-623634260]here[/url] you can read about him. It of course does not fit into Skyrim, but you can still learn about him and his past, because it's pretty much the same.


[color=#93c47d][size=4][u][i][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

Name: Derek
Race: Nord
Class: Damage Dealer
Start level: 15 - 100
Weight: 100
Height: 1.05

He [b]CAN[/b] be married, break his heart and I'll break you ;)

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Fighting Skills[/u][/color]

Twohanded
Light Armor
Onehanded
Block
Heavy Armor

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Where to find him[/u][/color]

Falkreath, House of Arkay


[color=#93c47d][size=4][u][i][b]FILE INFORMATION AND INSTALLATION[/b][/i][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Requiers[/u][/color]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Realistic Teeth only for V1.1
[color=#d9ead3][u]
[/u][/color][size=3][color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ File info[/u][/color]

Current Version: V2.0 NSFW only atm - non realistic Teeth
V1.1 - SFW & NSFW - Realistic Teeth & Non realistic Teeth
[/size]
[color=#d9ead3][u]⇒ Installation[/u][/color]

With Nexus Mod Manager/MO or manually in your Skyrim/data Folder
[color=#e06666][size=3]Only install one of the main files![/size][/color]
[color=#d9ead3][u]
⇒ Update[/u][/color]

Delete the old file then install the new Version
